name: Poincaré Conjecture ✅
problem_statement: Every simply connected, closed 3-manifold is homeomorphic to the 3-sphere.
ai_ml_relevance: Medium - Topology relevant to manifold learning
why_matters_for_ai: Topology crucial for understanding high-dimensional data manifolds
Manifold learning fundamental to dimensionality reduction
Geometric insights apply to neural network optimization landscapes
Historical lesson in rigorous proof methodology
barrot_approach: Apply topological insights to manifold learning
